description: A powerful pirate crew led by Donquixote Doflamingo, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. The crew operates from Dressrosa and has various criminal enterprises.

keyMoments.title: Buffalo and Baby 5 Retreat
keyMoments.description: Buffalo and Baby 5 attempt to retreat from Punk Hazard with Caesar Clown after realizing Law has betrayed them.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's loyalty to Doflamingo and their mission to protect his interests.
